original_text: ‘Everybody knows the law. People cannot go to meet the king in his own part of the palace unless the king asks them to come. All the king's officers and all his people know that that is the law. If somebody decides to go to the king when the king has not asked to see him, that person must die. He will only stay alive if the king holds out his gold sceptre towards him. As for me, the king has not asked me to go to him for the last 30 days.’
korean_text: 왕의 신하들과 왕의 각 지방 백성이 다 알거니와 남녀를 막론하고 부름을 받지 아니하고 안뜰에 들어가서 왕에게 나가면 오직 죽이는 법이요 왕이 그 자에게 금 규를 내밀어야 살 것이라 이제 내가 부름을 입어 왕에게 나가지 못한 지가 이미 삼십 일이라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: People cannot go to meet the king in his own part of the palace
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 왕의 궁 전용 구역에 왕을 만나러 갈 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: unless the king asks them to come
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그들을 오라고 부르지 않는 한

sentences.original_text: All the king's officers and all his people know that that is the law
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 모든 관리들과 백성들은 그것이 법이라는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: If somebody decides to go to the king
when the king has not asked to see him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그를 만나달라고 요청하지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: if the king holds out his gold sceptre towards him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그를 향해 금 홀을 내밀 경우에만

sentences.original_text: the king has not asked me to go to him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 내게 그에게 오라고 요청하지 않았습니다
